channel.title: VTX:ROG on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Swiss Leaders Seek Roche, Novartis Talks Amid US Tariffs
item.description: Switzerland’s government has reached out to local drugmakers Roche Holding AG and Novartis AG to discuss the tariff situation, a spokesperson said, after the country was hit with the highest US levies

item.title: Sarepta-Roche Gene Therapy Fails to Get EU Regulator Approval
item.description: Roche Holding AG’s gene therapy Elevidys failed to get the backing of European regulators.
